message.body: U working on the house any days this week? I think I got the week off and I could do a day
Im planning on taking off thursday
You got some stuff I could help with ?
But I haven't gotten a chance to do any planning with michael yet
I think where ill really need you is for back corner demo and all that shit. I might try to get the dumpster for thursday and we can start rippin out the
wall. I guess we'll need scaffolding
Ok we'll just let me know. Hopefully I will have more free time because I'm planning on having a lot and starting work on new art
Awesome. Ill talk to michael tonight and see if we can get it together. If not, I think next week for sure
